setup_steps: 1. Create a Telegram bot by messaging @BotFather
2. Get your bot token from BotFather
3. Start a chat with your bot
4. Get your chat ID by messaging @userinfobot
5. Replace YOUR_BOT_TOKEN_HERE with your actual bot token
6. Replace YOUR_CHAT_ID_HERE with your actual chat ID
7. Set 'enabled' to true to activate notifications
